chapter.title: Open Sheets
chapter.para: Now that you've set up Employees and Projects, you are ready to begin processing Time and Expense Sheets. In this chapter we will review how to process Open Time and Expense Sheets. The following topics will be covered:

section.title: Open Sheets
section.para: The processing of Sheets is handled by the Open Sheets screen. For this scenario, we'll need to review the open Sheets to begin. To open a Sheet, follow these steps:

listitem.para: Follow this path: CRM > Project > Time and Expense...

tip.para: Some of the button options available in the toolbar may be disabled if you do not have the appropriate privileges. For more information, please see .

section.title: Sheet Tab
section.para: Let's begin a new Sheet. To get started, follow these steps:

listitem.para: Select the NEW button—this will open the Time and Expense screen
In the "Sheet Date" field, enter a date that represents the Sheet

note.para: The Sheet Date might be a Week Ending or Week Beginning date. Most companies will use a standardized approach for this date.

section.title: Sheet Details
section.para: Once you're on the Sheet tab, you are ready to enter detail information on the Sheet. To begin entering Line Items, select the NEW button. The following screen shows what you will see when selecting "Time" as the Time Sheet entry type:
Select the Project, Task, and reference Item previously created in earlier chapters. When done, select the SAVE button to close and exit line item.
Next, let's enter an expense entry. The following screen shows what you will see when selecting "Expense" as the Time Sheet entry type:

note.para: Individual fields are detailed in Reference Guide

section.para: Again, select the Project, Task and reference Item previously created in earlier chapters. When done, select the SAVE button to close and exit line item.
